snippet: ANGELO--John. The LeFrak family mourns the loss of our dear friend John Angelo. We send our deepest sympathies to his wife Judy, his sons Jack and Jessie, and his daughter Kate. John was a renaissance man, a one-of-a-kind individual who left a lasting impression on everyone he met, and was always fun to be with. We will miss him tremendously. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ANGELO--John. The LeFrak family mourns the loss of our dear friend John Angelo. We send our deepest sympathies to his wife Judy, his sons Jack and Jessie, and his daughter Kate. John was a renaissance man, a one-of-a-kind individual who left a lasting impression on everyone he met, and was always fun to be with. We will miss him tremendously. 1/3
